testcase.classname: Test Sescam app correct functionality login
testcase.name: As a user I want to enter in the Sescam app
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the Sescam app..........................................passed And Access button is disabled...............................................passed When Write aall31 and aall31................................................passed And Click on the access button..............................................passed Then User aall31 with password aall31 enter in the Sescam app...............passed

testcase.classname: Test Sescam app correct functionality login
testcase.name: I want to see the login error message
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to the app...................................................passed When Enter aaldfdf and aall876 incorrect....................................passed And User aaldfdf with password aall876 makes click on the access button.....passed Then It shows login error message...........................................passed And Recover contents of message.............................................passed And Input border is red.....................................................passed
